alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 10:34AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of San Bernardino, Riverside and central Orange Counties through 1115 AM PST... At 1033 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Huntington Beach, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anaheim, Santa Ana, Irvine, Huntington Beach, Garden Grove, western Corona, Orange, Costa Mesa, Mission Viejo, Tustin, Yorba Linda, Stanton, Seal Beach, Laguna Beach, Newport Beach, Westminster, Chino Hills, Fountain Valley, Placentia and Rancho Santa Margarita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
